alert.note: Alert for Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern York and southeastern Polk Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waco, or 9 miles east of York, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern York and southeastern Polk Counties, including the following locations... Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 356 and 365. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for east central Nebraska.
